item.title: Project: My WordPress Plugin shantz-wp-qotd updated to version 1.2.2
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: Updated my WordPress plugin shantz-wp-qotd to version 1.2.2 today. Introduction: Shantz WP QOTD is a plugin to add quotes to your wordpress blog in a few easy clicks. It adds quotes to your posts and your sidebars with a multitude of options for sources and customization. Changelog: Version 1.2.2 Fixed a bug because of which quotes were blank some times. Thanks to Thom for reporting it.
